summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.3°C) and outside temperature (up 2.6°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.9 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1763 m), light levels (up 5575 lux), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 178.2m lower than yesterday, 663.5m lower than the past week, 1762.6m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 713m and a high of 1594m, averaging 888.7m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and near calm conditions. Rain showers likely, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and bright intervals likely. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
